title: Using the Generic Associated Channel Label for Pseudowire in the MPLS Transport Profile (MPLS-TP)
abstract:
This document describes the requirements for using the Generic
Associated Channel Label (GAL) in pseudowires (PWs) in MPLS Transport Profile
(MPLS-TP) networks, and provides an update to the description of GAL usage in
RFC 5586 by removing the restriction that is imposed on using GAL
for PWs, especially in MPLS-TP environments.  [STANDARDS-TRACK]
